Human rights in MoroccoIndex 0: The Convention on the Prevention and Punishment of the Crime of Genocide was introduced by the United Nations in 1948, though Morocco did not sign it and ratified it in 1958.
Human rights in MoroccoIndex 1: The International Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Racial Discrimination was introduced by the United Nations in 1966, signed by Morocco in 1967, and ratified in 1970.
Human rights in MoroccoIndex 5: The Convention on the Non-Applicability of Statutory Limitations to War Crimes and Crimes Against Humanity was introduced by the United Nations in 1968. Morocco has neither signed nor ratified this treaty.
Human rights in MoroccoIndex 7: The Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination against Women was introduced by the United Nations in 1979, and was ratified by Morocco in 1993 without having signed it.
Human rights in MoroccoIndex 8: The Convention against Torture and Other Cruel, Inhuman or Degrading Treatment or Punishment was introduced by the United Nations in 1984, signed by Morocco in 1986, and ratified in 1993.
Human rights in MoroccoIndex 9: The Convention on the Rights of the Child was introduced by the United Nations in 1989, signed by Morocco in 1990, and ratified in 1993.
Human rights in MoroccoIndex 11: The International Convention on the Protection of the Rights of All Migrant Workers and Members of Their Families was introduced by the United Nations in 1990, signed by Morocco in 1991, and ratified in 1993.
Human rights in MoroccoIndex 12: The Optional Protocol to the Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination against Women was introduced by the United Nations in 1999. Morocco has neither signed nor ratified this protocol.
Human rights in MoroccoIndex 13: The Optional Protocol to the Convention on the Rights of the Child on the Involvement of Children in Armed Conflict was introduced by the United Nations in 2000, signed and ratified by Morocco in 2000 and 2002, respectively.
Human rights in MoroccoIndex 15: The Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities was introduced by the United Nations in 2006, signed by Morocco in 2007, and ratified in 2009.
Human rights in MoroccoIndex 18: The Optional Protocol to the International Covenant on Economic, Social and Cultural Rights was introduced by the United Nations in 2008. Morocco has neither signed nor ratified this protocol.
Human rights in MoroccoIndex 19: The Optional Protocol to the Convention on the Rights of the Child on a Communications Procedure was introduced by the United Nations in 2011, signed by Morocco in 2012, but not yet ratified.
